SV019.SV019_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal20"/][UE:Meta key="eae07b41b93242eaa3458c42846c0b0f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]It is I, yes,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the famous [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal20"/]Vonda[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You must
be [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] is that right?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="eae07b41b93242eaa3458c42846c0b0f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]A little birdie on the research task force
told me that it was YOU who rescued me![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="eae07b41b93242eaa3458c42846c0b0f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm so sorry, lovely...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I seem to be
overwhelmed with emotion at the thought.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I don't know how to express my gratitude!
SV019.SV019_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal20"/][UE:Meta key="504076d9256843dc951879128b1ab345" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Oh, lovely,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] how marvelous is this![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I've
always wanted to sing a duet with myself.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Are you up for it?
SV019.SV019_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal20"/][UE:Meta key="57c5827423f44a3abc31b5940d0913b9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Oh, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Aren't you just a happy little
thing![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I can tell simply by the way you
project your voice.
SV019.SV019_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal20"/][UE:Meta key="71426ece47cf4eaaaa665bfd40264b92" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]The way you flex your diaphragm when you
pant...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] You must be quite the vocalist.
SV019.SV019_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal20"/][UE:Meta key="eddee3998dde4ee4b2c7a6334c760e38" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I'm just so relieved that everyone is
safe and sound.
SV019.SV019_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal20"/][UE:Meta key="8820ada18b6f4788917192ff8823f018" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]What is that tune Mr. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is humming?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It sounds oddly familiar...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Could it be the
jingle from that noodle spot?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] No...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Maybe?
SV019.SV019_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal20"/][UE:Meta key="a9af4409f063471485a534d631ce0f79" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Mr. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s humming has this...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]unique
quality to it.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And the melody...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a9af4409f063471485a534d631ce0f79" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]The universe is such a diverse and
beautiful place,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] isn't it?
SV019.SV019_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal20"/][UE:Meta key="014f1db0bf1f411287b8e123ab74fa7f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]How marvelous![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Now we can all return
to our homes and everyday lives.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] To
celebrate the occasion,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I shall sing![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="014f1db0bf1f411287b8e123ab74fa7f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitSadNoVoice"/]Oh...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Everyone is busy with preparing for
the departure.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I see...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's a missed
opportunity,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] to be sure.
SV019.SV019_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal20"/][UE:Meta key="6ec2e569f53b4a9b9eda9fcfbde0f12d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]You wouldn't know it to look at him,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but our director possesses vocal
talents of his own.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6ec2e569f53b4a9b9eda9fcfbde0f12d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]In fact,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] when we return home,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I plan to
have him as a guest on my show!
SV019.SV019_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal20"/][UE:Meta key="1326e48d89bf4cb8a69f552dceda7a22" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Once I make my triumphant return to my
home planet, Enohay,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'll be sure to send
you an invitation to my next concert!
SV019.SV019_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal20"/][UE:Meta key="a5698fc54ede4cda880dd4da73aa215d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal20"/]Vonda[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] An opera singer whose
extraordinary voice can commune
with the gods of space itself.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a5698fc54ede4cda880dd4da73aa215d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]That's what they say about me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
or so I hear.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a5698fc54ede4cda880dd4da73aa215d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Obviously, it's not true at all.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm just
flattered that the thought crossed
someone's mind.
SV019.SV019_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal20"/][UE:Meta key="07c9a6deb7bb4c2db8df722ac2b7d96a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]That reporter girl...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] What do they call
her again? [etc:Wait frame="8"/]Ms. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal17"/]Muggs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="07c9a6deb7bb4c2db8df722ac2b7d96a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]It's the first time I've worked with her,
but she's something else. [etc:Wait frame="8"/]She's got a lot
of talent, that one.
SV019.SV019_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal20"/][UE:Meta key="d3c3d2f562434a56b9dbc55169e041fe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I'm always impressed at how our director
is able to discern and draw out the hidden
talents in others.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's a talent all its own![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d3c3d2f562434a56b9dbc55169e041fe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I've landed quite a few gigs thanks to that
eagle eye of his.
SV019.SV019_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal20"/][UE:Meta key="cff30131569c478dbc01fffa79ccad17" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]When I perform,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I think of the galaxy as
my stage.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] One of my favorite lyrics is
"the universe and all things are in flux."[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="cff30131569c478dbc01fffa79ccad17" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]Let us raise the curtain on those words
of truth...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]written by our very own [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal18"/]Frisé[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
The entire piece is called Song of Love.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="cff30131569c478dbc01fffa79ccad17" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Oh no.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I couldn't possibly sing it all right
now.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm missing the rest of my audience.
SV019.SV019_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal20"/][UE:Meta key="4d7f10866686434e8b2fe5f05a703926" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Some believe my perfect pitch allows
me to read the thoughts and feelings
of others through their voices.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4d7f10866686434e8b2fe5f05a703926" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]Of course there's no truth to that rumor![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4d7f10866686434e8b2fe5f05a703926" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Between you and me...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]I'm actually worried
that I'm starting to lose my hearing a bit.
SV019.SV019_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal20"/][UE:Meta key="bd5171d9e2114ed39b81178a9d41c698" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]What is that tune Mr. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is humming?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It sounds oddly familiar...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Could it be the
jingle from that noodle spot?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] No...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Maybe?
SV019.SV019_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal20"/][UE:Meta key="afc25a32d3964b7a874fcd8f633c1fd8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Mr. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s humming has this...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]unique
quality to it.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And the melody...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="afc25a32d3964b7a874fcd8f633c1fd8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]The universe is such a diverse and
beautiful place,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] isn't it?
SV019.SV019_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_01_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal20"/][UE:Meta key="23e47463d50a46759e5d2f98e3c10e3b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I am what they call a celebrity.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I actually
came to this planet to star in a television
production,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'll have you know.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="23e47463d50a46759e5d2f98e3c10e3b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Unfortunately, the production's spaceship
crashed amidst our arrival.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It was probably
a sign to stick to what I do best.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="23e47463d50a46759e5d2f98e3c10e3b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I'm a diva—by trade,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] of course.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] A
chanteuse of the stars![etc:Wait frame="8"/] A universal
phenomenon![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Literally speaking.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="23e47463d50a46759e5d2f98e3c10e3b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="QuestionFaceOnly"/]You still listening, lovely?
SV019.SV019_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal20"/][UE:Meta key="6f49b7d0279941bea1afc01dc12d946e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal20"/]Vonda[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] An opera singer whose
extraordinary voice can commune
with the gods of space itself.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6f49b7d0279941bea1afc01dc12d946e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]That's what they say about me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
or so I hear.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6f49b7d0279941bea1afc01dc12d946e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Obviously, it's not true at all.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm just
flattered that the thought crossed
someone's mind.
SV019.SV019_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal20"/][UE:Meta key="4649d9c877b642afb93cda9405c9fb8a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]That reporter girl...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] What do they call
her again? [etc:Wait frame="8"/]Ms. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal17"/]Muggs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4649d9c877b642afb93cda9405c9fb8a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]It's the first time I've worked with her,
but she's something else. [etc:Wait frame="8"/]She's got a lot
of talent, that one.
SV019.SV019_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal20"/][UE:Meta key="67a35cb7a4e5413681eb27f586880e48" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I'm always impressed at how our director
is able to discern and draw out the hidden
talents in others.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's a talent all its own![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="67a35cb7a4e5413681eb27f586880e48" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I've landed quite a few gigs thanks to that
eagle eye of his.
SV019.SV019_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal20"/][UE:Meta key="26df4881b9fd40ca95d9bb1282bb953a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I'm worried about our director.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I hope he
will soon be found...
SV019.SV019_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_02_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal20"/][UE:Meta key="85a003b64df94a98a4057188ba228c9d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] thank the stars![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Our director has
been rescued.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] How marvelous.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="85a003b64df94a98a4057188ba228c9d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I was quite worried.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] His ability to think
rationally has been known to almost
disappear when it comes to his work.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="85a003b64df94a98a4057188ba228c9d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]But we've lost the camera,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so I suppose
the shoot is canceled now anyway?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="85a003b64df94a98a4057188ba228c9d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]You know what?![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I think I should have my
next concert right here on this planet![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It would give us all something fun to do...
SV019.SV019_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal20"/][UE:Meta key="99a2ca769c3243e0b0afcbba5f0ae37e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]When I perform,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I think of the galaxy as
my stage.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] One of my favorite lyrics is
"the universe and all things are in flux."[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="99a2ca769c3243e0b0afcbba5f0ae37e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]Let us raise the curtain on those words
of truth...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]written by our very own [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal18"/]Frisé[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
The entire piece is called Song of Love.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="99a2ca769c3243e0b0afcbba5f0ae37e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Oh no.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I couldn't possibly sing it all right
now.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm missing the rest of my audience.
SV019.SV019_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal20"/][UE:Meta key="188b039357014e009a6f421b5463077c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Some believe my perfect pitch allows
me to read the thoughts and feelings
of others through their voices.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="188b039357014e009a6f421b5463077c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]Of course there's no truth to that rumor![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="188b039357014e009a6f421b5463077c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Between you and me...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]I'm actually worried
that I'm starting to lose my hearing a bit.
SV019.SV019_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal20"/][UE:Meta key="873d60be80dd42b3b43a33abaa85857f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I can't say how,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I get the sense that
our director and that reporter would make
a cute couple...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] But that's our little secret!
